text_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $14$ units.
Find the length of the line $BC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $14$ units.
Find the length of the line $BC$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
Point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $B$ and $D$.
The line $AP$ is perpendicular to the line $DP$.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $AB$, $AD$, $AP$, $CB$, $CD$, $CP$, $BD$, $BP$, and $DP$ forming the rhombus and its diagonals.
